effects.effect: The next strike made against the target gains an edge.

items.name: Haunt
items.target: Self or one ally with a Phasing trait

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target shifts up to their speed.
The ghost chooses one additional target.

items.name: Shriek
items.trigger: A creature within distance targets the ghost with a strike.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The ghost halves the damage from the strike and the target takes 2 sonic damage.
Each undead with a Phasing trait within 10 squares of the ghost can't be made slowed or weakened.

items.name: Paranormal Activity
items.target: Each size 3 or smaller object in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target rises 1 square into the air and is vertically pulled up to 5 squares toward the nearest enemy within 3 squares of the target.

effects.tier3: P<3 the target is levitated until the end of the encounter

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A levitated target floats 1 square off the ground when first affected, then rises 1 square at the end of each of their turns. If a levitated target can't already fly, they can fly but are slowed and weakened while flying this way.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target who has P<2 is reduced to 1 Stamina if they are winded after taking this damage.

The ghost can move through creatures and objects at their usual speed, but can't end their turn inside a creature or object. The first time in a round that the ghost moves through a creature, that creature takes 2 corruption damage. The ghost doesn't take damage from being force moved into objects.
